LanguageData.LetterPsylinkLevelGained_First:
{USER_labelShort} has gained {USER_possessive} first level of magical attunement! {USER_pronoun} is now a mage.

To use magic, {USER_labelShort} must build up mana through meditation. The effectiveness of this meditation is increased if the person can focus on a specific object while meditating.

Different people are able to focus on different objects. This depend on the person's backstories, traits, and titles. For example:

- Mages with royal titles meditate on their thrones.
- Mages with tribal childhoods meditate to anima trees and nature shrines.
- Ascetic mages meditate to blank walls.
- Psychopathic mages meditate to graves, ideally with a loved one inside.

You can see someone's magical focus types by looking at their info card with the 'i' button.

LanguageData.RPGAdventureFlavourPack_Config_Warning_M:
If you are seeing this message while trying to play along with Mr Samuel Streamer's RPG modpack it means you probably haven't downloaded or correctly applied the recommended configs. Please make sure you have followed the mod configs section of the pack setup instructions available on the steam collection page for Rimworld: RPG Medieval Adventure

If you are not playing along with the modpack and have just downloaded the RPG flavour mod for your own RPG style playthrough, that's great! Sorry for the inconvenience!

If you'd like to permenantly disable this warning without downloading the configs for the pack simply tick the box marked "Don't warn about missing pack config" in the RPG Flavour Mod settings.
